full_summary:
### Standing Offer for Salmonid Milt Preservation Services

#### Government Tender Announcement

**Tender Reference Number:** 30000317A

**Publication Date:** August 22, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** September 7, 2023, 1:00 PM EDT

**Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) Number:** CB-8352-37941891

**Contracting Entity:** Fisheries and Oceans Canada

#### Summary

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) invites qualified suppliers to submit bids for a Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) for Salmonid Milt Preservation services. The SOA will provide preservation services for salmonid milt on an "as and when" requested basis to meet the specific needs of the Statement of Work.

#### Scope of Requirements

The scope of the contract includes:

* Preserving freshly extracted salmonid milt through cryopreservation
* Inventorying and safely storing the cryopreserved milt for an indeterminate period
* Reanimating the milt as and when required for female gamete fertilization
* Identifying and prescribing appropriate preservation methods for species of salmonids, including Chinook, Coho, Sockeye, Steelhead, and Atlantic Salmon

#### Key Details

* The Standing Offer Agreement will be awarded to one (1) supplier
* The Supplier will provide services to the Identified Users across Canada
* Deliveries will not be required in areas subject to Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements (CLCAs)
* Description of the services and activities are outlined in the Statement of Work (SOW) attached to this RFSO

#### Tender Requirements

* Tenderers must be able to provide the required services for a period of up to 4 years
* The selection criteria will be based on the lowest price submitted
* The RFSO is open to all qualified suppliers based in Canada

#### Contact Information

For further information or to obtain a copy of the RFSO, please contact:

Cal LaKing
Phone: (506) 478-3581
Email: DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca

You can download the RFSO from the canadabuys website: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8352/30000317a---rfso.pdf
